column5: hey all im heading to sharbot lake sat for the opener of bass just wondering if some one could point me in the right direction,im heading out from Doran bay  i don't want your spots just an idea where to go from my starting point,and what colours are best for smallmouth.  Hawg Hunter  pm me if ya wish.....
I have drove by it 50 times and never got around to fishing it.....  good luck

Head out on Silver lake if you can. Use tubes and yum dingers on the shores and you should do well. Try this at Sharbot also, sorry i have yet to fish this lake but i know there right close to each other.
